title: Rube Goldberg and Dr Seuss would be proud!
body:
Another fabulously cool t-shirt launching machine. This one is, at
it's heart, a baseball throwimg machine. But driven by a bicycle,
flashing lights, dry ice, sound effects, a 15 shirt magazine... A
human powered t-shirt machine-gun. A great piece of engineering.
The shirts really flew. Until one of the chains broke. Major
heartbreak! But wonderful none-the-less.
